name: Penciled
headline: Fill 10X more canceled appointments
description: Penciled (W24) helps physical therapists fill 10X more canceled appointments. The core of our product is an AI agent named Nicole. Nicole helps patients join the waitlist, maintains live availabilities, and texts and calls waitlist patients to fill canceled appointments. When fully deployed, Nicole fills 79% of cancellations detected and takes an average of 3 minutes to fill an appointment. Therapists using Nicole see a 194% increase in cancellations filled.

founders.name: Shawn Shivdat, Founder
founders.description: CEO & Co-founder of Penciled. Studied Computational Neuroscience at Harvard. Previously built patient outcome prediction software at MGH, built and launched a jobs board product at a health tech startup, and founded a global nonprofit organization.

generated_description:
**Penciled: Revolutionizing Appointment Management for Physical Therapists**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, Penciled is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to help physical therapists fill 10 times more canceled appointments. At the heart of its offering is an AI agent named Nicole—think of her as a virtual assistant dedicated to maintaining therapist schedules while ensuring patients receive prompt communication.

**How Does It Work?**
Nicole's capabilities are impressive. She manages waitlists and keeps track of live appointment availabilities, reaching out to patients via text and calls. When deployed, she fills around 79% of detected cancellations in under three minutes. The results speak for themselves: therapists using Nicole have seen a staggering 194% increase in their ability to fill canceled appointments.

**Why Should You Care?**
Appointment cancellations can significantly dent a therapist’s income and the patient’s care continuity. Penciled's AI not only mitigates this issue but also allows for a more seamless clinic operation. Clinics report saving roughly $3,000 per location per month by using Nicole, plus the added benefit of needing fewer front-office staff. This means therapists can focus more on patient care rather than playing phone tag—an efficiency boost that doesn’t just streamline processes but improves patient engagement.

**Team and Support**
Despite being a small team of two, they are backed by Y Combinator and have the mentorship of Gustaf Alstromer, a noted figure in startup circles. Penciled's growth trajectory suggests that even with a lean setup, significant market impact is achievable.

**The Bigger Picture**
Penciled exemplifies how AI can streamline administrative tasks in healthcare, allowing human professionals to do what they do best: provide excellent patient care. As the healthcare landscape becomes increasingly data-driven, solutions like Penciled are poised to lead the charge in operational efficiency.

If you’re in the physical therapy field and facing challenges with appointment no-shows, it might be worthwhile to check out Penciled. You can visit their website [Penciled](https://penciled.com) to learn more or book a demo to see Nicole in action.
